title: India Sees Deadliest Day Of Pandemic With COVID-19 Deaths Topping 4000
content:
1. India Sees Deadliest Day Of Pandemic With COVID-19 Deaths Topping 4000  NPR
  2. More people are dying from Covid in India than at any stage of the pandemic  CNN
  3. India's surge hits southern states, prompts more lockdowns  The Associated Press
  4. Op-Ed: Antidemocratic politics worsen India's COVID calamity  Los Angeles Times
  5. World shares India's pain with growing COVID-19 crisis  The Japan Times

localize.title: インド、COVID-19による死者数が4000人を超え、パンデミックの最悪の日となる
印度出现大流行病中最致命的一天，COVID-19死亡人数达到4000人以上
